p: PEDV is an enveloped, positive-stranded RNA virus in the genus Alphacoronavirus, family Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales ( 14, 15). The genome of a PEDV is ~28 kb in length and is composed of seven open reading frames (ORFs) arranged in the order 5′-ORF1a/1b-S-ORF3-E-M-N-3′, which encodes four structural proteins and 17 non-structural proteins (nsp1-nsp16, and ORF3) ( 16, 17).
